mapper.sql: hostNo, hostId, name, content, type, address, parking, openStart, openEnd, holiday
mapper.select:
select count(*) as listCnt from host
where type like '%' || #{ type } || '%'
select sf.savedfilename from host h, space s, spacefile sf where h.hostno = s.hostno and s.spaceno = sf.spaceno and sf.flag = 1 and h.hostno = #{ hostNo } and rownum = 1
select sf.savedfilename from host h, space s, spacefile sf where h.hostno = s.hostno and s.spaceno = sf.spaceno and h.hostno = #{ hostNo }
select hostNo, hostId, name, content, type, address, parking, openstart, openend, holiday, ok from host WHERE ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{ value }||'%' order by hostNo DESC
select hostNo, hostId, name, content, type, address, parking, openstart, openend, holiday, ok from host WHERE type LIKE '%'||#{ value }||'%' order by hostNo DESC
SELECT hostNo, hostId, name, content, type, address, parking, openstart, openend, holiday, ok FROM host WHERE hostNo IN (SELECT hostNo FROM SPACE WHERE computer='1') order by hostNo DESC
SELECT hostNo, hostId, name, content, type, address, parking, openstart, openend, holiday, ok FROM host WHERE hostNo IN (SELECT hostNo FROM SPACE WHERE bim ='1') order by hostNo DESC
SELECT hostNo, hostId, name, content, type, address, parking, openstart, openend, holiday, ok FROM host WHERE hostNo IN (SELECT hostNo FROM SPACE WHERE wifi='1') order by hostNo DESC
SELECT hostNo, hostId, name, content, type, address, parking, openstart, openend, holiday, ok FROM host where hostNo IN (select hostNo from space where maximum < 10) order by hostNo DESC
SELECT hostNo, hostId, name, content, type, address, parking, openstart, openend, holiday, ok FROM host WHERE hostNo IN (SELECT hostNo FROM SPACE WHERE maximum > 9) order by hostNo DESC
mapper.delete: delete from host where hostNo = #{ hostNo }
delete from space where hostNo = #{ hostNo }
